    • Method Detail

      • authenticate

        public org.forgerock.http.protocol.Response authenticate​(org.forgerock.services.context.Context context,
                                                         org.forgerock.http.protocol.Request httpRequest)
        Handles both initial and subsequent RESTful calls from clients submitting Callbacks for the authentication process to continue. This is determined by checking if the POST body is empty or not. If it is empty then this is initiating the authentication process otherwise it is a subsequent call submitting Callbacks. Initiating authentication request using the query parameters from the URL starts the login process and either returns an SSOToken on successful authentication or a number of Callbacks needing to be completed before authentication can proceed or an exception if any problems occurred whilst trying to authenticate. Using the body of the POST request the method continues the login process, submitting the given Callbacks and then either returns an SSOToken on successful authentication or a number of additional Callbacks needing to be completed before authentication can proceed or an exception if any problems occurred whilst trying to authenticate.
        Parameters:
        context - The request context.
        httpRequest - The HTTP request.
        Returns:
        A Json Representation of the response body. The response will contain either a JSON object containing the SSOToken id from a successful authentication, a JSON object containing a number of Callbacks for the client to complete and return or a JSON object containing an exception message.
        Throws:
        org.restlet.resource.ResourceException - If there is an error processing the authentication request.

      • handleErrorResponse

        protected org.forgerock.http.protocol.Response handleErrorResponse​(org.forgerock.http.protocol.Request request,
                                                                   org.forgerock.http.protocol.Status status,
                                                                   Exception exception)
        Processes the given Exception into a Restlet response representation or wrap it into a ResourceException, which will be thrown.
        Parameters:
        status - The status to set the response to.
        exception - The Exception to be handled.
        Returns:
        The Restlet Response Representation.
        Throws:
        org.restlet.resource.ResourceException - If the given exception is wrapped in a ResourceException.

      • getLocalizedMessage

        protected String getLocalizedMessage​(org.forgerock.http.protocol.Request request,
                                     Exception exception)
        Get the localized message for the requested language if the given exception or its cause is an instance of L10NMessage.
        Parameters:
        exception - The exception that contains the localized message.
        Returns:
        The localized message.
